msg: Add a user: binding prefix, for reading and updating Portlet User Attributes.

msg: Generate code coverage for the contrib library.

msg: TAPESTRY-323: Allow control over the ErrorHandler used when building the HiveMind Registry.

author: hlship
msg: Make sure all the bits and pieces of a validation delegate are serializable and java UID.
Make it easy to subclass the ListenerMapSourceImpl to provide extra functionality related to the synthetic lilsteners.
Add logic to the Portlet home service to dynamically select the right page based on mime type, portlet mode, window state, etc.
